hadiths.english_translation: Narrated from Ali ibn Abi Talib. He said: Muawiyah in Syria was presented with a newborn who had a male organ like that of a man, and a female organ like that of a woman. He did not know what to judge concerning it. He sent people to ask Ali, may Allah be pleased with him, about it. Ali, may Allah be pleased with him, said to them: What is this like in Iraq? Be truthful with me. They informed him of the matter. He said: May Allah curse a people who are satisfied with our judgment while making fighting against us permissible. Then he said: Look at where he urinates. If he urinates from where a man urinates, then he is a man. If he urinates from where a woman urinates, then he is a woman. They said: O Commander of the Believers, he urinates from both places. He said: Then he has half the share of a man and half the share of a woman.
